20 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_REPLICATOR_H__INCLUDED
21 #define TILEDARRAY_REPLICATOR_H__INCLUDED
22 
23 #include <TiledArray/external/madness.h>
24 
25 namespace TiledArray {
26 namespace detail {
27 
29 
34 template <typename A>
35 class Replicator : public madness::WorldObject<Replicator<A> >,
36  private madness::Spinlock {
37  private:
38  typedef Replicator<A> Replicator_;
39  typedef madness::WorldObject<Replicator_>
40  wobj_type;
41  typedef std::stack<madness::CallbackInterface*,
42  std::vector<madness::CallbackInterface*> >
43  callback_type;
44 
45  A destination_;
46  std::vector<typename A::size_type> indices_;
47  std::vector<Future<typename A::value_type> > data_;
48  madness::AtomicInt sent_;
49  World& world_;
50  volatile callback_type callbacks_;
51  volatile mutable bool probe_;
52 
54  void do_callbacks() {
55  callback_type& callbacks = const_cast<callback_type&>(callbacks_);
56  while (!callbacks.empty()) {
57  callbacks.top()->notify();
58  callbacks.pop();
59  }
60  }
61 
63  class DelaySend : public madness::TaskInterface {
64  private:
65  Replicator_& parent_;
66 
67  public:
69  DelaySend(Replicator_& parent)
70  : madness::TaskInterface(madness::TaskAttributes::hipri()),
71  parent_(parent) {
72  typename std::vector<Future<typename A::value_type> >::iterator it =
73  parent_.data_.begin();
74  typename std::vector<Future<typename A::value_type> >::iterator end =
75  parent_.data_.end();
76  for (; it != end; ++it) {
77  if (!it->probe()) {
78  madness::DependencyInterface::inc();
79  it->register_callback(this);
80  }
81  }
82  }
83 
85  virtual ~DelaySend() {}
86 
88  virtual void run(const madness::TaskThreadEnv&) { parent_.send(); }
89 
90  }; // class DelaySend
91 
93 
95  bool probe() const {
96  madness::ScopedMutex<madness::Spinlock> locker(this);
97 
98  if (!probe_) {
99  typename std::vector<Future<typename A::value_type> >::const_iterator it =
100  data_.begin();
101  typename std::vector<Future<typename A::value_type> >::const_iterator
102  end = data_.end();
103  for (; it != end; ++it)
104  if (!it->probe()) break;
105 
106  probe_ = (it == end);
107  }
108 
109  return probe_;
110  }
111 
113  void delay_send() {
114  if (probe()) {
115  // The data is ready so send it now.
116  send(); // Replication is done
117  } else {
118  // The local data is not ready to be sent, so create a task that will
119  // send it when it is ready.
120  DelaySend* delay_send_task = new DelaySend(*this);
121  world_.taskq.add(delay_send_task);
122  }
123  }
124 
126  void send() {
127  const long sent = ++sent_;
128  const ProcessID dest = (world_.rank() + sent) % world_.size();
129 
130  if (dest != world_.rank()) {
131  wobj_type::task(dest, &Replicator_::send_handler, indices_, data_,
132  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
133  } else
134  do_callbacks(); // Replication is done
135  }
136 
137  void send_handler(const std::vector<typename A::size_type>& indices,
138  const std::vector<Future<typename A::value_type> >& data) {
139  typename std::vector<typename A::size_type>::const_iterator index_it =
140  indices.begin();
141  typename std::vector<Future<typename A::value_type> >::const_iterator
142  data_it = data.begin();
143  typename std::vector<Future<typename A::value_type> >::const_iterator
144  data_end = data.end();
145 
146  for (; data_it != data_end; ++data_it, ++index_it)
147  destination_.set(*index_it, data_it->get());
148 
149  delay_send();
150  }
151 
152  public:
153  Replicator(const A& source, const A destination)
154  : wobj_type(source.world()),
155  madness::Spinlock(),
156  destination_(destination),
157  indices_(),
158  data_(),
159  sent_(),
160  world_(source.world()),
161  callbacks_(),
162  probe_(false) {
163  sent_ = 0;
164 
165  // Generate a list of local tiles from other.
166  typename A::pmap_interface::const_iterator end = source.pmap()->end();
167  typename A::pmap_interface::const_iterator it = source.pmap()->begin();
168  indices_.reserve(source.pmap()->local_size());
169  data_.reserve(source.pmap()->local_size());
170  if (source.is_dense()) {
171  // When dense, all tiles are present
172  for (; it != end; ++it) {
173  indices_.push_back(*it);
174  data_.push_back(source.find(*it));
175  destination_.set(*it, data_.back());
176  }
177  } else {
178  // When sparse, we need to generate a list
179  for (; it != end; ++it)
180  if (!source.is_zero(*it)) {
181  indices_.push_back(*it);
182  data_.push_back(source.find(*it));
183  destination_.set(*it, data_.back());
184  }
185  }
186 
188  delay_send();
189 
190  // Process any pending messages
191  wobj_type::process_pending();
192  }
193 
195 
197  bool done() {
198  madness::ScopedMutex<madness::Spinlock> locker(this);
199  return sent_ == world_.size();
200  }
201 
203 
208  void register_callback(madness::CallbackInterface* callback) {
209  madness::ScopedMutex<madness::Spinlock> locker(this);
210  if (sent_ == world_.size())
211  callback->notify();
212  else
213  const_cast<callback_type&>(callbacks_).push(callback);
214  }
215 
216 }; // class Replicator
217 
218 } // namespace detail
219 } // namespace TiledArray
220 
221 #endif // TILEDARRAY_REPLICATOR_H__INCLUDED
